div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Illness and Disorder
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Rare Disease
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Reaction Allergy

description.value: The Value Set is used to code clinical conditions relevant for the laboratory results interpretation. It is defined as the union of: (a) EHDSIIllnessandDisorder (b) EHDSIRareDisease (c) EHDSIReactionAllergy (d) EHDSIExceptionalValue
